description: slightly tapered cylindrical body with applied molded baseband topped with meander wire and stamped foliate cut-card band; meander wire at rim; flat domed cover with engraved crenate peak; center of cover set with a Louis XV coin of 1728 within an engraved arrowhead band; cast corkscrew thumbpiece; hollow scroll handle with beaded rattail descending from shaped and engraved hinge plate; five part hinge; engraved area on body with organic/foliate elements surrounding crest at center with mythical animal and harp-like instrument
title: Tankard
